name: opensourcepos
description: Open Source Point of Sale is a web based point of sale system written in the PHP language. It uses MySQL as the data storage back-end and has a simple user interface.

scripts.buildsetup: npm install -g grunt-cli && bower install && cd grunt045 && npm install cd ../
scripts.buildtasks: grunt task1 && cd grunt045 && grunt task2 && cd ../ && grunt task3 && cd grunt045 && grunt task4 && cd ../ && grunt task5 --force && cd grunt045 && grunt task6 && cd ../ && grunt task7
scripts.build: npm run buildsetup && npm run buildtasks
npm run install && npm run buildsetup && npm run buildtasks && npm run watch
scripts.update: npm update & composer self-update & composer update
scripts.clean: grunt clean:composer & grunt clean:bower & grunt clean:npm
